CustomField.description: Used as unique identifier while creating an article from a case
CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(LEFT(Subject,120), ":", ""), ";", ""), "!", ""), "^", ""), " ", ""), ".", ""), "§", ""), "°", ""), "$", ""), "_", ""), "*", ""), "'", ""), "'s", ""), "#", ""), "=", ""), "/", ""), "«", ""), "»", "") + (SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( TIMENOW() ), ":", ""), ".", ""), " ", "") )
CustomField.label: Current Time
